title: Lanka IOC increases prices to match Ceypetco
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Lanka IOC said that it increased fuel prices according to the Ceypetco price increase with effect from 3 AM on Tuesday (24).
Sri Lanka decided to revise fuel Prices with effect from Tuesday (24) 3 AM.
Minister Kanchana Wijesekera tweeted that the Fuel pricing formula that was approved by the cabinet was applied to revise the prices.
